name: U-BOOT 1945
description:
1945 year. Germany was crushed, all submarines ordered to return to the ports. But to return is equally - surrender and be taken prisoner. You command one of the boats like u-boot VIIc and decide to sail to the shores of neutral countries to save your boat and crew. But there are many dangers on the way - minefields, magnetic mines, signal buoys, deep-bombed boats, patrolling convoys and other dangers. But freedom is not given at a simple price.

Features:
  • stylized pleasant graphics, immersive in the atmosphere of those times
  • strong, and at the same time relaxing melancholic soundtrack
  • gameplay of increased complexity
